==Recollections==
{{Description|'''Lost Traveler in the Ashen Realm: Review'''<br />In order to retrieve the legendary "Jade of Return," you and your companion {{Little One}} arrived at the ancient city of [[Ochkanatlan]]. Your adventures take you to the [[Tonatiuh]] together with the Adventurer [[Bona]], whom you met in the ruins. After driving off the wicked dragon that attacked and successfully boarding the ship, you gradually discovered the truth hidden behind the Jade of Return, and finally retrieved the important token needed to undo the blessing of the "Flamelord" from the hands of [[Och-Kan]] as he lay upon the brink of death...}}
